execution_plan.description: Get each EU customer's email, name and number of orders in the EU region (include customers with zero orders).
execution_plan.query:
SELECT c.email AS email, c.full_name AS full_name, c.id AS customer_id, COALESCE(o.order_count, 0) AS order_count, 'EU' AS region
FROM customers c
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count
  FROM orders
  GROUP BY customer_id
) o ON c.id = o.customer_id;

execution_plan.description: Get each US customer's email, name and number of orders in the US region (include customers with zero orders).
execution_plan.query:
SELECT c.email AS email, c.full_name AS full_name, c.id AS customer_id, COALESCE(o.order_count, 0) AS order_count, 'US' AS region
FROM customers c
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count
  FROM orders
  GROUP BY customer_id
) o ON c.id = o.customer_id;
